body.directions: Listen to the audio, then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.textVersion: Audio for past 以前 yǐqián

body.quiz: Which of the following items can be associated with the word in the audio?
body.answer: My grandma’s album with black-and-white photos
options: My little sister’s class schedule for next semester
My mom’s TV guide showing this evening’s programs
The weatherman’s report for next week’s weather
body.correct: Job excellently done! 以前 yǐqián means “in the past,” and of the items shown, Grandma’s photo album can remind us of the past.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the phrase again. Think about its meaning, and then consider what the items in the choices indicate; past, present, or future.

body.quiz: Which of the following does not have the same final as the 1st character of the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 城市 chéngshì
options: Audio for 冰激凌 bīngjīlíng
Audio for 庆祝 qìngzhù
Audio for 眼镜 yǎnjìng
body.correct: Outstanding job! The 1st character in the word 经常 jīngcháng (often) has final “ing.” Of the choices, the only word that does not have “ing” as final is 城市 chéngshì (city).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio again and identify the final. Then compare it with the four options on the list to see which one does not have the same final.

body.quiz: Which of the following serves the same function in a sentence as the word in the audio?
body.correct: Excellent job! 总是 zǒngshì means “always.” It’s an adverb indicating frequency of an action. So is 从不 cóngbù (never), which is also a frequency adverb.
body.incorrect: So close! Listen to the word again. Think about what type of word it is and what function it serves in a sentence; then review the word in the choices and find the one that does the same thing.

body.quiz: Where do you most likely find the item indicated by the word in the audio?
options: On the podium at a conference
When waiting at a bus station
Along the trail in the woods
body.correct: Wonderfully done! 蛋糕 dàngāo means “cake,” and you can easily find it at a local bakery shop, without it being a surprise.
body.incorrect: So close! Listen to the word again. Understand its meaning, and then consider at what places it can be reasonably found.
